location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Statements of Imports and Exports into the Port of Bushire for the Year 1832/33 and Abstract of a Report made by the Resident in the Persian Gulf in 1829/30

mods.abstract: A breakdown of the types of goods traded between Bushire and India in 1832/33. The goods in question are listed by the ship that imported/exported them, and their estimated value in Bombay rupees is provided. The statement of imports is located on folio 15, and the statement of exports on folio 15v.Included on folio 16 is an abstract of a report on the imports/exports from Bushire in the year 1829/30. It includes a break down of the type of goods traded, and their estimated value in Bombay rupees.
